Name: CRAZY DRIVER
About the game: CRAZY DRIVER - is an endless car chasing game where you have to avoid police for as long as possible. The goal is to collect as much cash as you can avoiding your car crashing. Features: variety of vehicles to chose from addicting racing gameplay 7 types of vehicle atmosphere of madness /
